title: New bicycle
creator_credit: Jack Lieberman and U E V A
brief_description: Uses the purchasing of a new bicycle to illustrate the entire purchasing process, including the computerised ordering at the store, operations at the steel mill and on the assembly line, and the transportation of the finished product.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Lieberman and U E V A
